text: ERROR. You may have set an incorrect text id.
This minimal text dialog node uses default values, and will end shortly.

superfluous_example.name: Name
text: Required value.

choices.self_comment: janky way to say: different next id by choice depending on condition

choices.text: You haven't talked to me before.
I see you've talked to me before.

next: default_id, must always be last and a string

text: Welcome, [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20][wave amp=50 freq=2]&[/wave][/rainbow].

opening_scene.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]Brave Knight,| I have called you here today| in our darkest| hour!||[/shake]

os_2.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]For countless generations| the crown has been a symbol of strength,| fortitude,| and happiness.||[/shake]

os_3.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]But alas,| I have lost it in our castle's deepest,| darkest,| dungeon.|| Who knows what foul beasts await ye|...poisonous rats,| traps,| winged beasts,| ghoulies|..........Where was I? [/shake]

os_4.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]Oh, yes.|| I require your aid, great warrior.|| Gather your courage for the journey,| vanquish the evil that lurks below,| ascend to the place of honor among the Hall of the Greats,| and return the CROWN to it's rightful place on my head||........What say you?||[/shake]

choices.text: Yes, my liege. I will retrieve the crown!

boring_spiel_accept.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]You are very brave indeed,| now heed these words of wisdom:|| I am reminded of the time when,| as a young boy,| I got stuck in a thicket with a sweetroll my mother gave me..||It was quite prickly||...the thicket,| not the sweetroll||...and it ripped a hole right in my...[/shake]

boring_spiel_decline.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]Very Well,| listen closely.|| I am reminded of the time when,| as a young boy,| I got stuck in a thicket with a sweetroll my mother gave me..||It was quite prickly||...the thicket,| not the sweetroll||...and it ripped a hole right in my...[/shake]

bs_2.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]...|The next thing you know...|||......bananas and milk...|...........scraping mud off my boots......|..........|it was the funniest thing ye know?.............|And that's how I obtained 5 loaves of bread from the market that day...|[/shake]

choices.text: You are very wise, Your Majesty

onward.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]Onward, stalwart knight!|[/shake]

king_praise_1.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]O valiant knight! Thou bested the foul beasts from below,| and in such quick manner!||| Our kingdom will forever know the journey you took this day.|[/shake]

king_praise_2.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]As thanks,| please except this lucky coin I found in my courtyard this morning! Don't spend it all in one place,||| ho ho!|[/shake]

king_praise_3.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]...This reminds me of the time when,| as a new recruit, |I was tasked with hunting down a bear....|....Did I mention it was the second week of the month so the lunar festival was about to begin.......|........|Honey as far as the eye could see...|[/shake]

choices.text: I can't take this, I'm ending the game.

king_praise_4.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]...The night was filled with whimsy......|..........I was 40 years young,| ho ho........|...... Suddenly skeleton mages surrounded us......|........I had a tummy ache that night,| but I still ate the entire pie! |||HO HO!|[/shake]

choices.text: I can't take this, I'm ending the game.

king_praise_5.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]...It had the aroma of sweaty feet and rotting pumpkins......|.........At that time I came across an ancient rune with great power........|......I can't think of anything else......|........WELL DONE,| YOU ARE A TRUE GAMER!|[/shake]

choices.text: I'm taking notes, say it slower this time!
I can't take this, I'm ending the game.

king_praise_6.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=6]Very Well, valiant knight! Thou bested the foul beasts from below,| and in such quick manner!||| Our kingdom will forever know the journey you took this day.|[/shake]

blocked_stairs.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=15]DON'T COME UP UNTIL YOU'VE FOUND THE CROWN!||[/shake]
